text: "Let's Get It On" is a 1973 song by Marvin Gaye and is the title track to his 13th studio album of the same name. It went to number 1 in the United States, number 11 in Canada and number 31 in the United Kingdom. Category:1973 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Marvin Gaye songs
title: Let's Get It On (song)
